similar_tickets.title: Re: Mails are not auto synching in traveler #IM 459920 #IM 1831629
similar_tickets.description: Mails are not auto synching in traveller, please check. SSO ID: ASCAL1905 Amit Samanta 9836235558
similar_tickets.resolution: IM1831629 Scheduled sync settings are available from the settings display of the IBM Traveler application. Select the settings for Auto Sync, and then select Schedule. You can set the behavior for two time periods; a peak time schedule and an off-peak schedule. The sync settings can be any of the following: â¢ Always connected â¢ Manual â¢ Every 15 minutes â¢ Every 30 minutes â¢ Every hour â¢ Every 2 hours If you specify a different sync setting for peak and off-peak times, then you must specify the peak time period. You can define the days of the week for the peak time and when the peak time should start and stop. For example, you might define the sync behavior to be Always Connected between your working hours (Monday â Friday, 8 a.m. to 6 p.m.), then define your off-peak setting as Every 2 hours.
